name: Sussy Beans: 2
description:
WELCOME TO THE WONDERFUL WORLD OF:

  • FAST-PACED PARKOUR
  • BEANS
  • EPICNESS

In Sussy Beans 2, as a bean, you have to complete a series of levels.  Sussy Beans 2 has many cool movement mechanics such as sliding, smashing into the ground, and dashing! As a bean, you go through these levels, with a mysterious creature communicating with you. Perhaps you can meet it somehow...

A LEVEL ICON

TRAILER

COMPLETE ALL THE LEVELS TO UNLOCK THE LEVEL PICKER AND LEARN MORE ABOUT THE BEAN GOD...CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Spacebar - Jump

L. SHIFT - Dash

E - Smash (into the ground)

L. CTRL - Slide

UPDATES COMING IN THE FUTURE!!! 

ALL CONSTRUCTIVE FEEDBACK IS VERY APPRECIATED!

MOST IMPORTANTLY, ENJOY!
